thread.title: Comcast to Buy Majority Stake in Universal Studios Japan
thread.title_full: Comcast to Buy Majority Stake in Universal Studios Japan - WSJ

author: Atsuko Fukase
title: Comcast to Buy Majority Stake in Universal Studios Japan
text:
TOKYO—Comcast, the largest U.S. cable operator, said Monday it will acquire a 51% stake in the holding company of Universal Studios Japan for $1.5 billion through NBCUniversal, in a deal that would help the media giant seek further growth internationally.
The enterprise value of USJ is ¥750 billion ($6.2 billion), including debts of ¥400... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
